meanings.definition: A type of ancient glass bead.
meanings.sent1: The archaeologist found an aggry in the ancient tomb.
meanings.sent2: She wore a beautiful necklace adorned with aggry beads.
meanings.sent3: The children played with the colorful aggry beads, pretending they were precious jewels.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like aggry beads in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aggry bead shimmered with a rainbow of colors, captivating all who saw it.

meanings.definition: To make or decorate with aggry beads.
meanings.sent1: She carefully aggried the vase with intricate glass beads.
meanings.sent2: The artisan aggries each piece with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: He aggried the costume with beads, making it stand out at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity aggried the room, adding a touch of elegance to the decor.
meanings.sent5: The artist aggried the sculpture, turning it into a masterpiece of glass and light.
